prompts: Create a mythical flying Pokemon with silver feathers and a majestic wingspan.
Imagine a legendary creature that embodies the power of the ocean and the sky.
Generate a serene Pokemon that has a calm demeanor and glides gracefully through the air.
Design a majestic aquatic Pokemon with a sleek body and powerful wings for soaring.
Show me a powerful psychic-type Pokemon with a striking blue and white color scheme.
Make a legendary Pokemon known for its protective nature and strong bond with the sea.
Give me a mythical bird-like Pokemon that can control storms and commands respect.
